mdRecord.dcterms:title: Copper Still Transfer by Alcoholic Beverage Control Board
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letters, release, documents, and stories relating to the transfer of a still held in the evidence locker of the Floyd County Sheriffs Office to the Floyd County Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Deeds
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: General District Court of Floyd County, Virginia
